price: a on, oholeći se, okrenu se nastranu i reče: “Čarobnjak je ili lud.”
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
